You have learned a lot about Quick Settings.

Your task: Add the Simm Quick Setting in your Quick Settings panel.

I will guide you through it in the next screens.

1. Open the Quick Settings panel. Then tap the Edit button.

2. Find the Simm setting. It looks like a star.

3. Drag the Simm setting into main panel. Then tap on it. That's it!

Well done!

You completed the Quick Settings challenge!
